Articles.Content:
Just curious if anyone could tell me what constitutes an "active" crew. Maybe it's just crews in general, but before updating to 1.0 I had far more than the 10 (of twelve) active crews it now states I have, and they are still there, scattered about at various bases and landed planes around the planet. Perhaps it's just a bug from upgrading that it doesn't count all the manned vehicles? I also have a ton of kerbals, and thus the astronaut complex states my next hiring cost is 00,000,000,000,000.00 or something like that. 

Does anyone know if these values can be edited etc? I may just have to switch back to sandbox to have my massive string of bases and mining operations, but I do like some of the limits of career mode such as vehicle cost etc., so just wondering if there's anything I can do to continue without being limited by number of crews etc. Is it possible to transfer my persistent save file to a sandbox game if there is no way around the kerbal limits? Thanks for any light you can shed on this, the kerbal empire thanks you.
